title: Miniguides Vim
body:
“How do I work with … in Vim?” questions should have an answer below.
Recipes Scroll horizontally # Add nowrap settings to $MYVIMRC set formatoptions-=t set textwidth=0 set wrapmargin=0 # Scroll half screenwidth to the right zL # Scroll half screenwidth to the left zH Reading list Vifm - Manual in Vimdoc format
